input.sentences: morale | welfare and recreation - what could be more important to a soldier ?
these plates will be given out to special volunteers
the commander gives the opening speech .
output.sentences: Today we held the MWR appreciation party, including this sweet sheet cake from Safeway.
We had these really nifty wooden trophies made.
The theme of the afternoon was Honoring Army Families.
The General made a speech about the sacrifice families make in war time which was very touching.
After the awards were handed out we got to the most important part of the event: CAKE!
